title: Mcp-On-Aws-Bedrock
description: A project to implement and interact with Anthropic's Model Context Protocol (MCP) using AWS Bedrock.
creator: davidshtian

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The AWS access key ID used for authentication.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The AWS secret access key used for authentication.

AWS_REGION.description: The AWS region where Bedrock is accessible.
